entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 6:05 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: ESE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
